import java.io.*;
class cfr102
{
    public static void main(String args[])throws IOException
    {
        BufferedReader obj=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        System.out.println(" ");
        String s=obj.readLine();
        int month=0;
        int d=0;
        String m;
        if(s.charAt(1)==' ')
        {
            d=Integer.parseInt(s.substring(0,1));
            m=s.substring(2,s.lastIndexOf(" "));
        }
        else
        {
            d=Integer.parseInt(s.substring(0,2));
            m=s.substring(3,s.lastIndexOf(" "));
        }
        if(m.equals("January"))
        month=1;
        else if(m.equals("February"))
        month=2;
        else if(m.equals("March"))
        month=3;
        else if(m.equals("April"))
        month=4;
        else if(m.equals("May"))
        month=5;
        else if(m.equals("June"))
        month=6;
        else if(m.equals("July"))
        month=7;
        else if(m.equals("August"))
        month=8;
        else if(m.equals("September"))
        month=9;
        else if(m.equals("October"))
        month=10;
        else if(m.equals("November"))
        month=11;
        else if(m.equals("December"))
        month=12;
        int y=Integer.parseInt(s.substring(s.lastIndexOf(" ")+1,s.length()));
        int sum1=(d*month)+y;
        cfr102 c1=new cfr102();
        int sum2=c1.sumOfDigits1(sum1);
        int sum3=c1.sumOfDigits2(sum2);
        System.out.println(sum3);
    }
    public int sumOfDigits1(int x)
    {
        if(x/10==0)
        return x;
        else 
        return (x%10+sumOfDigits1(x/10));
    }
    public int sumOfDigits2(int y)
    {
        if(y/10==0)
        return y;
        else
        return (y%10+sumOfDigits2(y/10));
    }
}
